column1: Little Goat Diner////No fifth star because the soda is stupid overpriced. Seriously. And because we ordered the fried pickles and onion rings and they were just yuck. If you like sweet fried pickles and onions
column2: then maybe this would be your jam
column3: but every fried pickle and onion ring I've had is savory. The hunt for solid fried pickles continues...
